Package stocks.controller

Class GuiController

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.stocks.controller.GuiController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Features
    public class GuiController
extends java.lang.Object
implements Features
    Implements the Features interface. Interacts with the Model and the View, allows the user to interact with the program using the GUI.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GuiController​(PortfolioManagementModel pm)
      Creates a default constructor of Controller and initializes Model class.

      • buyMultipleStock

        public void buyMultipleStock​(java.lang.String tickerList,
                             java.lang.String weightList,
                             java.lang.String date,
                             double total,
                             double commission,
                             boolean show)
        Description copied from interface: Features
        Allows the user to bulk purchase multiple stocks in a single transaction on a specific date.
        Specified by:
        buyMultipleStock in interface Features
        Parameters:
        tickerList - Stock ticker list to be purchased.
        weightList - Weight distribution of the stocks to be purchased that sum upto 100%.
        date - Date of Purchase of the stock.
        total - The total amount for which the transaction is executed.
        commission - Commission for the transaction.
        show - Toggle between displaying a popup confirmation to user or not.

      • createPortfolioWithSip

        public void createPortfolioWithSip​(java.lang.String tickerList,
                                   java.lang.String weightList,
                                   java.lang.String startDate,
                                   java.lang.String endDate,
                                   int interval,
                                   double total,
                                   double commission)
        Description copied from interface: Features
        Allows the user to create a portfolio with a basket of stocks and periodically invest in the basket of stocks.
        Specified by:
        createPortfolioWithSip in interface Features
        Parameters:
        tickerList - Stock ticker list to be purchased.
        weightList - Weight distribution of the stocks to be purchased that sum upto 100%.
        startDate - Start date for the SIP to execute.
        endDate - (Optional) End date for the SIP to terminate.
        interval - Frequency of execution of the SIP
        total - he total amount for which the SIP is executed.
        commission - Commission for the SIP execution.
